function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Adverse effects of internal processes and complex structures on the deployment of co-creation capabilities","Impact":"Impairment of the firm's capacity to co-create value with others and resolve service-related problems","Mitigation":"Streamlining internal processes, simplifying organizational structure, and increasing efficiency","Technologies":"Process optimization software, organizational reengineering tools","People":"Firm employees, management, and stakeholders","Owner":"Firm leadership and management"},{"Description":"Ineffective deployment of co-creation capabilities leading to lack of deep relationships with customers","Impact":"Reduced customer engagement, limited insights into customer needs, and decreased trust","Mitigation":"Training and development programs for employees, fostering a customer-centric culture, and implementing feedback mechanisms","Technologies":"Customer relationship management (CRM) systems, customer feedback platforms","People":"Firm employees, management, and customers","Owner":"Firm leadership and management"}]}
